overview: A comedic exploration of deviance as some of America's most popular comedians get interviewed by fellow comic Susanna Lee (who's a sex worker on the side) while giving them a peepshow they'll never forget. Featuring Joey Diaz, Felipe Esparza, Laurie Kilmartin, Alonzo Bodden, Sam Tripoli, Jimmy Pardo, Paul Provenza, Brian Redban, Emily V. Gordon, Solomon Georgio, Baron Vaughn, and many more!
tagline: One woman's bold and comedic exploration of deviance.
title: Pervs
